page.title: 12Help for the Elderly
page.content: {Salmonsbury House}is a residential home for the elderly in need of some form of help and is run by the County Council. It has{38 residents}plus{2 {places for Day Care}and social and practical activities are organised for them.{Market Close}provides community accommodation for{49 independent elderly people and a{resident warden} organises activities. The{Handicapped {Centre}caters for{30-40 physically {handicapped people}each Tuesday and members take part in various craft activities. New premises are due for completion in 1985.{The Day Hospital operates at the Hospital with help from a medical team. Pupils from the local secondary school help at these centres and at the homes of local elderly. Further help comes from{Red {Cross, St. John's Ambulance Brigade, {Meals on Wheels}and{Cheery Club.
